actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide for an increase in benefits computed under the special minimum formula to coincide with the 1975 cost-of-living increase in benefits computed under  the regular formula.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Provides for an increase in Social Security benefits under title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) computed under the special minimum formula to coincide with the 1975 cost-of-living increase in benefits computed under the regular formula.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide for an increase in benefits computed under the special minimum formula to coincide with the 1975 cost-of-living increase in benefits computed under  the regular formula.
